name: Omar Adem
coverLetter: I'm a quick learner and always open to something new. My friend isna trimmer and told me I should look into it. Always been a team player. I'm currently looking to work on Mondays, Thursdays, and Fridays. Monday and Thursday  shifts will be anytime before 7pm since I'm in the theatre training those days 7pm-11pm. I'm open all day Friday. If this can work,l for you guys, that would be amazing.
